VStack{
	ScrollView(.vertical){
	VStack{

	HStack(alignment: .top, spacing: 0){

	Text("sdfsdf") 
.background(Color(red:255.0/255, green:255.0/255, blue: 255.0/255))
.font(.custom("", size:15 ))

.foregroundColor(Color(red:0.0/255, green:0.0/255, blue: 0.0/255))
.frame(alignment: .leading)
} 
.frame(minWidth: 0, maxWidth: .infinity,alignment:.center)

.background(Color(red:255.0/255, green:255.0/255, blue: 255.0/255))
.frame(height: 100, alignment: .center)

	HStack(alignment: .top, spacing: 0){

	Text("sdfsdf") 
.background(Color(red:255.0/255, green:255.0/255, blue: 255.0/255))
.font(.custom("", size:15 ))

.frame(height: 100, alignment: .center)

	Text("sdfsdf")

.background(Color(red:255.0/255, green:255.0/255, blue: 255.0/255))
.frame(height: 100, alignment: .center)

	Text("sdfsdf")

.background(Color(red:255.0/255, green:255.0/255, blue: 255.0/255))

	HStack(alignment: .top, spacing: 0){

	Text("sdfsdf") 
.background(Color(red:255.0/255, green:255.0/255, blue: 255.0/255))
.font(.custom("", size:15 ))

.foregroundColor(Color(red:0.0/255, green:0.0/255, blue: 0.0/255))

.frame(height: 100, alignment: .center)
} 

.background(Color(red:255.0/255, green:255.0/255, blue: 255.0/255))
.padding(.leading, 10).padding(.top, 10).padding(.trailing, 10).padding(.bottom, 10).frame(alignment: .center)
} 

.background(Color(red:255.0/255, green:255.0/255, blue: 255.0/255))
.frame(height: 300)

 Spacer() 
 } 

.background(Color(red:104.0/255, green:171.0/255, blue: 217.0/255))
.frame(alignment: .top)

 .flipsForRightToLeftLayoutDirection(true)
 .environment(\.layoutDirection, .leftToRight)
